Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023: Appeared in 9 games, starting 7... Had 17 receptions for 230 yards, caught 2 touchdowns... Longest reception of 44 yards came against Eastern New Mexico... Had 3 rushing attempts for 13 yards... Had 1 kick return for 38 yards against Montana Tech... Had 7 punt returns for a total of 55 yards.

2022: Started all 10 games for the Wildcats... led the Wildcats in receiving yards with 450 on 25 catches for an average of 45 yards per game... caught three touchdowns... longest catch of 67 yards... also had 25 total rushing yards on five carries... had two punt returns for 20 yards with the longest return being 12 yards... returned one kickoff for 22 yards.

2021: Appeared in four games … caught one pass, for 19 yards and a touchdown against Lincoln.

2020: Redshirted the 2020 season.

High School: 2020 graduate of A.C. Davis High School in Yakima, Wash. … coached by Demond Demas … honorable mention All-Big 9 in as a junior … was a second team selection as a senior.

Personal: Son of Marcus and Niki Cook … born Oct. 17 … has 5 siblings … majoring in Business Finance.
